metric.name: getRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations get requests.

metric.name: putRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations put requests.

metric.name: putAllRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations putAll requests.

metric.name: destroyRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations destroy requests.

metric.name: queryRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations query requests.

metric.name: destroyRegionRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations destroyRegion requests.

metric.name: containsKeyRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations containsKey requests.

metric.name: processBatchRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations processBatch requests.

metric.name: clearRegionRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations clearRegion requests.

metric.name: clientNotificationRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client operations notification requests.

metric.name: updateClientNotificationRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client notification update requests.

metric.name: closeConnectionRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client close connection operations requests.

metric.name: connectionLoad
metric.description: The load from client to server connections as reported by the load probe installed in this server.

metric.name: readGetRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading get requests.

metric.name: processGetTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client get request, including the time to get an object from the cache.

metric.name: getResponses
metric.description: Number of getResponses written to the cache client.

metric.name: writeGetResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing get responses.

metric.name: readPutRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading put requests.

metric.name: processPutTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client put request, including the time to put an object into the cache.

metric.name: putResponses
metric.description: Number of putResponses written to the cache client.

metric.name: writePutResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing put responses.

metric.name: readPutAllRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading putAll requests.

metric.name: processPutAllTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client putAll request, including the time to put all objects into the cache.

metric.name: putAllResponses
metric.description: Number of putAllResponses written to the cache client.

metric.name: writePutAllResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing putAll responses.

metric.name: readDestroyRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading destroy requests.

metric.name: processDestroyTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client destroy request, including the time to destroy an object from the cache.

metric.name: destroyResponses
metric.description: Number of destroy responses written to the cache client.

metric.name: writeDestroyResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing destroy responses.

metric.name: readQueryRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading query requests.

metric.name: processQueryTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client query request, including the time to destroy an object from the cache.

metric.name: queryResponses
metric.description: Number of query responses written to the cache client.

metric.name: writeQueryResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing query responses.

metric.name: readDestroyRegionRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading destroyRegion requests.

metric.name: processDestroyRegionTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client destroyRegion request, including the time to destroy the region from the cache.

metric.name: destroyRegionResponses
metric.description: Number of destroyRegion responses written to the cache client.

metric.name: writeDestroyRegionResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing destroyRegion responses.

metric.name: readContainsKeyRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent reading containsKey requests.

metric.name: processContainsKeyTime
metric.description: Total time spent, in nanoseconds, processing a containsKey request.

metric.name: containsKeyResponses
metric.description: Number of containsKey responses written to the cache cli­ent.

metric.name: writeContainsKeyResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent writing containsKey responses.

metric.name: readProcessBatchRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading processBatch requests.

metric.name: processBatchTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client processBatch request.

metric.name: processBatchResponses
metric.description: Number of processBatch responses written to the cache client.

metric.name: writeProcessBatchResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing processBatch responses.

metric.name: batchSize
metric.description: The size (in bytes) of the batches received.

metric.name: readClearRegionRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading clearRegion requests.

metric.name: processClearRegionTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client clearRegion request, including the time to clear the region from the cache.

metric.name: clearRegionResponses
metric.description: Number of clearRegion responses written to the cache cli­ent.

metric.name: writeClearRegionResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing clearRegion responses.

metric.name: readClientNotificationRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading client notifica­tion requests.

metric.name: processClientNotificationTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client notification request.

metric.name: readUpdateClientNotificationRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading client notifica­tion update requests.

metric.name: processUpdateClientNotificationTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a client notifi­cation update request.

metric.name: clientReadyRequests
metric.description: Number of cache client ready requests.

metric.name: readClientReadyRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading cache client ready requests.

metric.name: processClientReadyTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client ready request, including the time to destroy an object from the cache.

metric.name: clientReadyResponses
metric.description: Number of client ready responses written to the cache client.

metric.name: writeClientReadyResponseTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in writing client ready responses.

metric.name: readCloseConnectionRequestTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in reading close connection requests.

metric.name: processCloseConnectionTime
metric.description: Total time, in nanoseconds, spent in processing a cache client close connection request.

metric.name: failedConnectionAttempts
metric.description: Number of failed connection attempts.

metric.name: currentClientConnections
metric.description: Number of sockets accepted.

metric.name: currentClients
metric.description: Number of client virtual machines (clients) connected.

metric.name: outOfOrderGatewayBatchIds
metric.description: Number of Out of Order batch IDs (batches).

metric.name: abandonedWriteRequests
metric.description: Number of write operations (requests) abandoned by clients

metric.name: abandonedReadRequests
metric.description: Number of read operations (requests) abandoned by clients

metric.name: receivedBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes received from clients.

metric.name: sentBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes sent to clients.

metric.name: messagesBeingReceived
metric.description: Current number of messages being received off the network or being processed after reception.

metric.name: messageBytesBeingReceived
metric.description: Current number of bytes consumed by messages being received or processed.

metric.name: connectionsTimedOut
metric.description: Total number of connections that have been timed out by the server because of client inactivity.

metric.name: threadQueueSize
metric.description: Current number of connections waiting for a thread to start processing their message.

metric.name: acceptsInProgress
metric.description: Current number of server accepts that are attempting to do the initial handshake with the client.

metric.name: acceptThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of threads created (starts) to deal with an accepted socket. Note, this is not the current number of threads.

metric.name: connectionThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of threads created (starts) to deal with a client connection. Note, this is not the current number of threads.

metric.name: connectionThreads
metric.description: Current number of threads dealing with a client connection.

metric.name: loadPerConnection
metric.description: The estimate of how much load is added for each new con­nection as reported by the load probe installed in this server.

metric.name: queueLoad
metric.description: The load from subscription queues as reported by the load probe installed in this server

metric.name: loadPerQueue
metric.description: The estimate of how much load would be added for each new subscription connection as reported by the load probe installed in this server
